tool_description: Analyzes historical speed data to predict future conveyor belt speed trends and potential performance issues using time series analysis.
error_messages: Insufficient data: At least 20 historical speed measurements with timestamps are required for trend analysis.
Timestamp mismatch: The number of timestamps must match the number of speed measurements.
Invalid prediction horizon: prediction_horizon must be between 1 and 168 hours.
Invalid trend sensitivity: trend_sensitivity must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 formatted strings.
usage: Provide historical speed data with timestamps and specify prediction horizon. The tool analyzes trends and provides speed forecasts.

predicted_speeds.description: Array of predicted speed values for the forecast horizon

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, stable

anomaly_probability.description: Probability of anomalous behavior in forecast period
